articles.title: FM Spokesman Rejects "Presidential Statement" of UNSC
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Rejects "Presidential Statement" of UNSC
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on August 31 as regards the fact that the U.S. and its vassal forces rigged up a "presidential statement" of the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) condemning the intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket launching drill of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA):
					 On August 30, the UNSC released a "presidential statement" distorting the truth as if the DPRK's launch of intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 undermined regional peace and stability and caused grave security concerns around the world.
					
					 The DPRK categorically rejects the "presidential statement" of UNSC that flagrantly violated the right to self-defense of a sovereign state.
					
					 We had already warned the U.S. that we would be closely monitoring its conduct. The intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket launching drill carried out by the Strategic Force of the KPA this time is only a curtain raiser to the resolute countermeasures to be taken against the U.S. as it responded to our warning by waging belligerent Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					
					 The said drill is the first step taken by the KPA in its Pacific operation and a meaningful prelude to restraining Guam, the front-line base for invasion.
					
					 The U.S. had denied the DPRK's proactive measures to defuse the extreme tension and acted with imprudence. It is another lesson learned by the DPRK that only actions speak to the U.S., not polite words.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK shall conduct many more of ballistic rocket launching drill targeting the Pacific to further modernize and increase the actual combat efficiency of its strategic force.

articles.title: DPRK Central Court Sentences S. Korean Provokers to Death
articles.content:
DPRK Central Court Sentences S. Korean Provokers to Death
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Court of the DPRK issued the following statement Thursday:
					 The hostile forces, dumbfounded by the independent spirit and tremendous capabilities of Songun Korea demonstrating its might as a nuclear power of Juche and a world-level military power, are more persistently resorting to sordid smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 Taking the lead in the campaign are a group of conservatives in south Korea going helter-skelter, being unaware of their impending death.
					
					 Gentries of Dong-A Ilbo and Chosun Ilbo, newspapers speaking for the conservatives, committed a hideous crime of seriously insulting the dignity of the DPRK with the use of dishonest contents carried by "North Korea Confidential", a propaganda book authored by two British journalists.
					
					 The book was written by Daniel and James, correspondents of the British news weekly Economist and the Reuters to south Korea, two years ago. As a collection of words uttered by the riff-raffs including defectors from the north, it viciously slandered the reality of the DPRK with such sophism that "life of the north's citizens is capitalistic 100 percent".
					
					 The paid writers of the two newspapers of south Korea introduced the book as "a guide interesting to those wishing to know about the north", reeling off such sophism that "the north is a country where money has greater influence than in capitalist countries", "youngsters without mobile phones are treated losers", "army is unpaid labor unit" and that "those with money can get married to those of high positions in society any time".
					
					 They had the temerity of carrying a photo in which the red star, symbolic of the brilliant revolutionary traditions of anti-Japanese war engraved on the upper part of the national emblem of the DPRK, was replaced by $ symbol and the name of the "Democratic People's Republic of Korea" was replaced by the "Capitalist Republic of Korea". They even committed such shuddering acts of replacing the title of the book called "North Korea Confidential" with "Capitalist Republic of Korea".
					
					 Dong-A Ilbo, Chosun Ilbo and other conservative media in south Korea have so far committed smear campaign against the DPRK nonstop, adding to crimes already committed. Whenever there were such things, we seriously warned that that they will be made to pay a high price for their wild acts of escalating confrontation with the north.
					
					 However, those conservative media, defying this warning, have persisted in smear campaign against the DPRK. Now they have reached the state of slandering and insulting even the inviolable name of our country and its national emblem.
					
					 Not content with viciously slandering our socialist system, the most advantageous system centered on the popular masses which can not be found in any other parts of the world, they seriously insulted the name and emblem, symbols of the inviolable dignity of the DPRK. This is a never-to-be-pardoned high treason.
					
					 It is needless to say that this is a hideous act manipulated by the group of wicked conservatives who are breathing their last after being reduced into a group of living corpses in the face of stern punishment by history and the people's mindset.
					
					 Article 60 of the DPRK Criminal Code stipulates that those who insulted the dignity of the DPRK from the anti-state purpose shall be sentenced even to maximum punishment including death, depending on the severity of the perpetration.
					
					 The Central Court of the DPRK declares that Dong-A Ilbo journalist Son Hyo Rim and Director General Kim Jae Ho and Chosun Ilbo journalist Yang Ji Ho and Director General Pang Sang Hun will be sentenced to capital punishment under the DPRK Criminal Code.
					
					 The criminals hold no right to appeal and the execution will be carried out any moment and at any place without going through any additional procedures as soon as the objects are confirmed.
					
					 We will track down to the end those who masterminded and manipulated hideous provocations of slandering and insulting the dignity of the DPRK and mete out death to them.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, we warn the south Korean authorities still conniving at the crime by hack writers of Dong-A Ilbo and Chosun Ilbo. If they do not start immediate investigation into those criminals who insulted the dignity of the DPRK and do not punish them, they will be branded as accomplices.
					
					 It should be clearly understood that neither mercy nor leniency will be shown to those who slander the inviolable dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 We will closely follow the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Malaysian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Malaysian King
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Sultan Muhammad V, the 15th king of Malaysia, on its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the king success in his work for the country's independent development and prosperity, expressing the belief that friendly ties between the two countries would further develop.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Malaysian PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Malaysian PM
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Datuk Seri Mohamad Najib Bin Tun Haji Abudul Razak, prime minister of Malaysia, on Thursday on its national day.
					 The message hoped that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in conformity with the desire of the two peoples, wishing the prime minister success in his work for the country's development and prosperity.
					
					 On the same day, Foreign Minster Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to his Malaysian counterpart Datuk Anifah Aman.

articles.title: Congratulations to Angolan President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Angolan President
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Joao Manuel Goncalves Lourenco who assumed the heavy responsibility of Angolan president.
					 The message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long-standing tradition would grow stronger and wished the Angolan president great success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: National Peace Committee of Korea Warns S. Korean Authorities Not to Run Reckless
articles.content:
National Peace Committee of Korea Warns S. Korean Authorities Not to Run Reckless
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Hwasong-12 rocket launched by the DPRK at dawn of August 29 hit the preset waters in the northern Pacific after flying over the Japanese archipelago.
					 A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement Thursday denounced the south Korean puppet forces for raising a hue and cry over the launch, as if a nuclear bomb was exploded in downtown Seoul.
					
					 According to the statement, the south Korean authorities are going busy, convening the presidium committee session of the "state security council" and making public a "denunciation statement".
					
					 At the instructions of the authorities to "demonstrate strong capabilities of punishment", the puppet forces hastily staged bomb dropping drills by F-15K fighter bombers and resorted to a foolish act of making to public the Hyonmu ballistic missile drilling ground, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In the meantime, they threatened they would introduce nuclear strategic assets of the U.S. and refer the DPRK's ballistic rocket launch issue to the UN Security Council together with the U.S. and Japanese masters, while trumpeting about the "tightened alliance" with the U.S. 
					
					 The recent ballistic rocket launch drill reminiscent of an actual war is the first step to a military operation in the Pacific conducted by the army of the DPRK and a meaningful prelude to containing Guam, an advance base of the U.S. for aggression, and it is just the beginning of the resolute countermeasures to the war drills staged by the U.S. and its stooges.
					
					 We will in the future, too, conduct ballistic rocket launching drill targeting the Pacific where the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' bases are stationed and show the resolute stand of Juche Korea to the arrogant U.S. in action, not in words.
					
					 It should not be forgotten even a moment that whole south Korea can turn into ruins if saber-rattling is shown before the steel gun barrel of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 The puppet forces should not run reckless, clearly understanding that their insensible acts in reliance on the U.S. which is unable to be responsible for its own fate will only accelerate their self-destruction.

articles.title: U.S. Is Chieftain Aggravating Situation of Korea: DPRK Permanent Representative in Geneva
articles.content:
U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Tense Situation of Korea: DPRK Representative in Geneva
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The chieftain driving the situation of the Korean peninsula to the point of explosion is none other than the U.S. which poses extreme nuclear threat and blackmail to the DPRK by conducting war exercises one after another near the peninsula with huge nuclear strategic assets involved.
					 The DPRK permanent representative to the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva stressed this in his speech at the plenary session of the third Geneva disarmament meeting on August 29.
					
					 The U.S. long-term hostile policy and daily increasing nuclear threats to the DPRK have forced the DPRK to have access to a nuclear deterrence and steadily bolster it to cope with them, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises staged in south Korea every year assume an aggressive and provocative nature and they increase the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and endanger the peace and security in the region and the world.
					
					 In March this year, we demanded that an emergency meeting of the UN Security Council be convened to discuss the issue of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					
					 The UNSC declined the DPRK's repeated requests. This is self-exposure of the fact that it has been reduced into the valueless puppet and political tool serving the U.S., away from its basic mission for ensuring international peace and security.
					
					 Now that the U.S. openly revealed its hostile attempt at the DPRK while staging joint military exercises for aggression despite the strong warnings of the DPRK, it becomes full-fledged exercise of the right to self-defense for the DPRK to take strong countermeasure, and the blame for the ensuing catastrophic consequences will rest with the U.S. which opted for military confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will never put the nuclear deterrence for self-defense on the negotiating table nor will take even an inch backward from the path of bolstering the country's nuclear force chosen by it as long as the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threats to the DPRK continue, he emphasized.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Thailand
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Thailand
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Land and Environment Protection led by Minister Kim Kyong Jun left here on Thursday to participate in the Asia-Pacific regional ministerial conference on environment and development to be held in Thailand.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists Introduce Nuclear Strategic Bombers and Stealth Fighters into S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists Introduce Nuclear Strategic Bombers and Stealth Fighters into S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressors on Thursday let fly B-1B nuclear strategic bomber formation and F-35B Stealth fighter formation on a moment's notice to sky above south Korea and conduct joint exercises for mounting preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK with the puppet warmongers, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces do not hide their bellicose nature, claiming that the exercises are to "counter" the DPRK's ballistic rocket launches and nuclear weapons development.
					
					 But the wild military acts of the enemies are nothing but the rash act of those taken aback by the intermediate-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket launching drill conducted by the army of the DPRK as the first military operation in the Pacific.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation Held
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation Held
 Tanchon, August 31 (KCNA) -- A sci-tech presentation for putting the production on a normal track at mines and enterprises in the area of Tanchon was held at the General Bureau of the Tanchon Area Mining Industry from August 28 to 31 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 The presentation brought together scientists, technicians, teachers and three-revolution team members of the Central Mining Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, the Komdok Mining Complex, the Tanchon Smeltery, the Tanchon Magnesia Factory, the Munphyong Smeltery and Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 It was divided into mining industry, nonferrous metal and fireproof material panels. Presented to the presentation were more than 300 papers reflecting the scientific and technological successes and experience gained in putting mines and enterprises on a modern and IT basis and putting their production on a normal track.
					
					 There was also a lecture on recent trend of scientific and technical development in the mining industry and nonferrous metal field and the magnesia goods production field.

articles.title: 43rd National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
43rd National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The 43rd National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize closed with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday.
					 The contest was held in Pyongyang and other places of local areas, divided into groups of senior secondary, junior secondary and primary schools.
					
					 Pyongyang City came first in team standings and 45 players were selected as April 18 best players.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK to Commemorate ICBM Launch
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK to Commemorate ICBM Launch
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued stamps (two sheets and one individual) in commemoration of the second successful test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 Seen on the stamps are letters reading "Demonstration of strategic nuclear force of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "The successful second test launch of ICBM Hwasong-14".
					
					 A sheet carries an image of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un among soldiers in the field of national defence science who successfully conducted the second ICBM test-launch on its center surrounded by pictures of the fluttering WPK flag and the ICBM soaring into the dark sky leaving a column of flames behind.
					
					 The other sheet, containing the peak height, distance and duration of the ICBM with the background of the globe, shows that the invincible mightiness and inexhaustible potentials of Juche Korea advancing under the banner of the new line of the great WPK for simultaneously developing the two fronts have been strikingly displayed once again.
					
					 An individual stamp depicts the ICBM soaring into the space with the boom of victory in the showdown with the U.S.

articles.title: Korean Students in Japan Meet Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
articles.content:
Korean Students in Japan Meet Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Union of Korean Students in Japan led by Ri Hong Yun, vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee, met with Hong Myong Gi, a pro-reunification patriotic fighter and former unconverted long-term prisoner, on Thursday.
					 Hong said that he could come back to the embrace of the motherland with dignity after decades of sufferings in jail as he maintained the immutable faith that the genuine happiness and honor of a revolutionary soldier is in firmly trusting only in the Party and the leader and following them.
					
					 He stressed that the former unconverted long-term prisoners are enjoying a happy and worthwhile life under the loving care and benevolence of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the members of the delegation would firmly keep to the road of patriotism true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean Students in Japan Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Korean Students in Japan Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Korean Students in Japan led by Ri Hong Yun, vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Members of the delegation expressed deep reverence before the statues of the great men.
					
					 At the halls where the great leaders lie in state, the visitors paid homage to them.
					
					 They looked round halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electronic car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: DR Congo Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DR Congo Delegation Leaves 
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Federation of Students and Pupils of DR Congo led by National Chairman Mpongo Ne Kongo left here for home by air Thursday.

articles.title: Solar Panels with Capacity of 100 kW Installed
articles.content:
Solar Panels with Capacity of 100 kW Installed
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) ? A project to install solar panels with a capacity of 100 kW was completed on the peak of Pegae Hill as part of the work to spruce up Samjiyon County in Ryanggang Province, the DPRK.
					 According to a person concerned, the solar battery manufactory under Kim Il Sung University and the electric power regiment of the 216 Division finished the project in ten days.
					
					 Researchers and workers of the manufactory installed hundreds of solar panels in three days in the spirit of self-reliance despite bad conditions.
					
					 And members of the electric power regiment carried out the ground concrete tamping in a qualitative way in a short span of time to contribute to creating 100 kW solar generating capacity.

articles.title: Production of Custom-built Equipment at Rakwon Machine Complex
articles.content:
Production of Custom-built Equipment at Rakwon Machine Complex
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Workers of the Rakwon Machine Complex in the DPRK are speeding up the production of custom-built equipment in the spirit shattering the heinous sanctions of the U.S. imperialists.
					 According to data available, they completed the production of equipment for the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and concluded technical arrangements of one-cubic-meter hydraulic excavators to be sent to the construction site of the Tanchon Power Station.
					
					 Now, they are pushing ahead with the production of speed reducer gears and accessories needed at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Kumsong Tractor Factory and the Sungri Motor Complex.
					
					 Meanwhile, they have improved the quality of products by introducing new technological innovations and increased the processing speed by use of some 20 kinds of processing jigs.
					
					 Jong Nam Chol, an official of the Ministry of Machine-building Industry, told KCNA that the workers of the complex are making innovations in the production of custom-built equipment in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.

articles.title: Frequent Accidents of U.S. War Weapons Foretell U.S. Imperialists' Ruin: Newspapers
articles.content:
Frequent Accidents of U.S. War Weapons Foretell U.S. Imperialists' Ruin: Newspapers
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK such as Rodong Sinmun, Minju Joson and Chongnyon Jonwi on Thursday carry an article stressing that the recent accidents of the U.S. war weapons like the Aegis ship foretell the ruin of the U.S. imperialists.
					 When the American empire is sinking into the bottom of sea with the Aegis ship, strategic rockets soared into the space in the East, shaking the world with great thunder and spouting grenadine fire, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 This shows the strategic position of Songun Korea rising rapidly.
					
					 And it is the dramatic situation that presents clear contrasts of justice with injustice, truth with falsity and victory with defeat.
					
					 The brilliant image of the powerful Paektusan nation rising like the sun with the absolute power of justice amid the tolling of the death knell for the American empire is certainly a cyclorama of epoch-making change.
					
					 The U.S., burning with wild dream to dominate the world unaware of its situation on the brink of collapse, should realize that it is no longer feared but derided by the world.
					
					 "Know thyself."
					
					 The U.S. should realize that if it disregards this warning of history and behaves recklessly, threatening peace in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia, the U.S. mainland will be wrecked tomorrow just like the Aegis destroyer wrecked today.
					
					 The American empire dyed in blood red is destined to ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un's Feats for Bolstering Nuclear Force
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un's Feats for Bolstering Nuclear Force
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday runs an article praising the feats of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for bolstering the state nuclear force.
					 The world-startling events in July demonstrating the dignity of the DPRK which turned into a possessor of strongest ICBM in a short period are a fruition of the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un who gave full play to the strong mental power of scientists in the field of national defence, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Supreme Leader unfolded a grand plan for bolstering the strategic nuclear force and has energetically led the officials, scientists and technicians in the field of research of rocket so that they can settle in our own way all processes and important factors ranging from design and manufacture of ICBM to its test-fire on the Juche-oriented stand.
					
					 He weathered all difficulties in the van for bolstering the state nuclear force with the death-defying will and great ambition to turn our country into an ICBM possessor.
					
					 He put forward the scientists in the field of national defence as loyal subjects of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), showing warm love and benevolence for them. And he made a strategic decision to further wring the neck of the Yankees when all the people celebrated the possession of ICBM and encouraged the scientists to achieve bigger victory by conducting successive offensive in the spirit of the "July 4 revolution".
					
					 The DPRK will shine forever as the nuclear power of Juche, a world-level military power, thanks to the undying feats of Kim Jong Un for building up the state nuclear force and the devoted efforts of the scientists in the field of national defence who are perfectly and strictly implementing the plan of the WPK Central Committee for turning the country into a strategic nuclear power.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Stop Touting "Conditions for Dialogue"; Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Stop Touting "Conditions for Dialogue"; Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article that the south Korean authorities have no qualifications to claim the north-south dialogue.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The "conditions for dialogue" mentioned by the south Korean authorities can never be possible in terms of the inter-Korean relations, and they are a self-contradictory thing denying the dialogue itself.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should understand who their rival is and their own situation before talking about the "conditions for dialogue", and speak and act with discretion.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula can never be solved unless the U.S. frantic hostile policy towards the DPRK and nuclear threat and blackmail which have lasted century by century ended as it was produced by them. This is recognized by the world.
					
					 The "dialogue related to the settlement of the north's nuclear issue" is trumpeted about by the ignorant who do not know the essence of the said issue and those who turn a blind eye to the destiny of the nation while running amuck for the moves to stifle the fellow countrymen pursuant to the foreign forces. Such dialogue is nothing but a daydream which should never be allowed to exist and which can never come true.
					
					 However loudly the south Korean authorities may clamor for the "conditions for dialogue", they can never evade from the responsibility for undermining the inter-Korean relations and bringing the hair-trigger war atmosphere to the peninsula.
					
					 The inter-Korean dialogue is nothing but an outward show as long as the fundamental stand of the south Korean authorities to the inter-Korean relations is not set right.
					
					 If they have a real interest in the dialogue, they should stop all the provocative moves of escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen while acting as stooges of the U.S. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should be mindful that the way for the inter-Korean dialogue would stop forever and the time of their ruin be accelerated, should they escalate confrontation with the DPRK while trumpeting about "conditions for dialogue".

articles.title: "Funeral" for War Maniac Trump Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
"Funeral" for War Maniac Trump Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A Funeral Committee for Trump of south Korea held a "funeral" for the war maniac before the U.S. embassy in Seoul on August 26, according to south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Students, citizens and other participants denounced Trump's crazy behavior of provoking war vociferating about "preventive war" and "igniting of war" and urged an immediate stop to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills intensifying the war crisis.
					
					 The speakers noted that they have conducted anti-U.S. vanguard activities for reunification in all parts of south Korea in denunciation of the war maniac who said that "even if a war breaks out, it will be fought on the Korean peninsula and even though thousands are killed, they will be there, not in the U.S. mainland."
					
					 They said that the "funeral" for Trump was held as he failed to come to himself.
					
					 The participants put the model of Trump's head in a small box depicting coffin.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Withdrawal of THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Withdrawal of THAAD
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea reportedly held the 183rd peace and disarmament rally outside the puppet Defense Ministry building on August 29, to demand the authorities withdraw the THAAD deployment, stop the joint military drill with the U.S. and abolish the military information protection agreement with Japan.
					 Speakers at the rally said that THAAD was defending only interests of the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 Saying that the "government" enforced the additional deployment of THAAD and was aggravating the war crisis by conducting the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, turning a deaf ear to the popular desire, they demanded an immediate stop to the war maneuvers.
					
					 They contended that the military information protection agreement with Japan for establishing the U.S.-Japan-south Korea tripartite military alliance should be abolished.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Treacherous Acts Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Treacherous Acts Slammed
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo on Wednesday carried an editorial to denounce the puppet authorities for inciting Japan's revival of militarism.
					 The editorial charged that the south Korean chief executive reaffirmed cooperation with Japan through telephone talks with the Japanese prime minister and the on-going joint military drill with the U.S. would lead to formation of military alliance with Japan.
					
					 The authorities decided to prolong a year the effective period of an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan, the second "Ulsa Five-point Treaty", the editorial noted.
					
					 A lasting peace is impossible as long as they remain bat-blind resorting to sycophancy and treachery, the editorial stressed.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment, the Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism and four other organizations in south Korea held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on August 28 to protest against the moves to enforce the THAAD deployment, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers declared that they would devotedly check the deployment of THADD as it is only for the U.S., gangster-like state wrecking peace in the Korean peninsula and inciting a tension and war between the south and the north.
					
					 A press release, read out at the conference, urged the south Korean chief executive to withdraw the additional deployment order without delay and reexamine the deployment from the beginning as he promised.
					
					 It appealed to all the people to come to Sosong-ri to wage the struggle against the additional THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Answers to Questions Raised by ITAR-TASS" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Aug. 21 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation and the 6th anniversary of his visit to its Siberian and Far Eastern regions.

articles.title: Russian Personages Visit DPRK Mission
articles.content:
Russian Personages Visit DPRK Mission
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Personages of the Maritime Territory Branch of the United Russia Party and the Maritime Territory Branch of the Youth Guards, an All-Russia social organization under the Unite Russia Party, visited the DPRK mission in Russia on August 22 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation.
					 They laid bouquets before an art work depicting President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il before paying tribute.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Flailed in China
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Flailed in China
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Spokesmen for Koreans' organizations in China respectively released statements to condemn the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces' war games against the DPRK.
					 A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China in its statement on August 23 branded the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill, which has been staged every year from the last century, as an anti-DPRK war gambling pursuant to the U.S. imperialists' gangster-like hostile policy and the south Korean puppet forces' confrontation policy.
					
					 A spokesman for the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in its statement on August 25 recalled that the DPRK warned the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to stop arrogant provocations at once and make a correct choice.
					
					 A spokesman for the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China in a statement on August 28 said that the Ulji Freedom Guardian, a prelude to a nuclear war against the DPRK, is enraging all Korean youths in China by extremely aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Foreign Parties and Organizations Support Korean People
articles.content:
Foreign Parties and Organizations Support Korean People
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Egypt and Pakistan released statements on August 17 and 18 to support the DPRK's ICBM test-launch and protest against the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt in its solidarity statement fully supported the test-launch, acknowledging it as a just right to self-defence.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The whole world knows about the ego-driven and arbitrary practices of the U.S. imposing sanctions upon other countries by abusing the name of the UNSC. To frustrate such practices is also a task facing the progressive peoples.
					
					 The U.S. should be well aware of the fact that if it provokes a war against the DPRK, it will spill over into the whole world.
					
					 The Pakistan National Federation of Trade Unions in a statement expressed deep concern over the situation on the Korean peninsula extremely strained by the U.S. which cooked up an anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" by abusing the name of the UNSC.
					
					 The U.S. is going so shameless as to escalate sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, faulting its access to nukes, despite the constant deployment of aggressor forces in south Korea, the statement said.
					
					 The statement expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just struggle, urging the U.S. to stop its arms buildup on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: British Bodies Protest U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
British Bodies Protest U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Political party and organizations of Britain staged a protest rally outside the U.S. embassy in London on Aug. 26.
					 Taking part in it were personages and members of the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula read out a written protest.
					
					 The protest termed the joint military drills by the U.S. and south Korea a war rehearsal against the DPRK.
					
					 Noting the drills again prove that the U.S. remains unchanged in its policy hostile to the DPRK, it urged the U.S. to roll back the hostile policy.

articles.title: British, Russian Bodies Criticize U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
articles.content:
British, Russian Bodies Criticize U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- British and Russian bodies criticized the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills on August 21 and 25.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula said in a joint statement:
					
					 Due to the Ulji Freedom Guardian 17 joint military drills being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces, the danger of war is increasing on the Korean peninsula and it may spill over into a global nuclear war in a moment.
					
					 The drills bring to light the aggressive nature of the U.S. imperialists to realize their colonial rule over whole Korea and dominate the Asia-Pacific region to all intents and purposes.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to dismantle the "UN Command" and withdraw its aggression troops from south Korea.
					
					 We appeal to all friends supporting the DPRK to more firmly defend the DPRK together with the followers of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation and the Regional Social Organization of Russia "Borozino" in their statements said the bellicose try of the U.S. to intimidate the DPRK by force of arms is no more than a pipedream.
					
					 The statements expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK would resolutely foil the moves of the U.S. imperialists to provoke a new war and achieve the independent reunification of the country without fail under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Meeting of Chongryon Officials in Kanto Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Chongryon Officials in Kanto Held
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- An emergency meeting of officials of the Kanto Branch of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place in Tokyo on Aug. 23 to let all Koreans in Japan turn out in the patriotic movement in view of the grave situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. imperialists and their followers' sanctions racket to stifle the DPRK and the racket to ignite a nuclear war against it.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, officials of the organizations under it and officials in Kanto.
					
					 Noting that the U.S., stunned by a series of successful ICBM test-launches in the DPRK, fabricated a UN "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK by instigating its followers, Ho in his speech termed it unheard-of pressure racket to stamp out the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities finally kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills on Aug. 21.
					
					 The U.S. anti-DPRK sanctions and military provocations have extremely strained the situation in the Korean peninsula and its vicinity, and the world is keeping tabs on it as it is an unprecedented touch-and-go situation.
					
					 He appealed to all officials to turn out in the struggle to devotedly defend respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the organizations of Chongryon and compatriots.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 Then followed a consultative meeting of leading officials of organizations under the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and chairpersons of the Kanto Branch organizations, at which immediate tasks for struggle and action were discussed and relevant measures taken.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza "declaracion presidencial" de CS de la ONU
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza "declaracion presidencial" de CS de la ONU 
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los Estados Unidos y sus satelites inventaron la "declaracion presidencial" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU contra el reciente ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance de las fuerzas estrategicas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 31 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					
					El dia 30, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU aprobo la "declaracion presidencial" tergiversando la realidad como si el ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance "Hwasong-12" de la RPDC perturbara la paz y la estabilidad de la region y causara la preocupacion por la seguridad del mundo. 
					
					Rechazamos totalmente este documento que infringe flagrantemente el derecho a la autodefensa de un Estado soberano. 
					
					El ejercicio de lanzamiento recien desarrollado por nuestras fuerzas estrategicas es el preludio de las contramedidas rotundas a EE.UU. que respondio con el simulacro conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian de caracter agresivo a la RPDC que advirtio que observara el proceder posterior del imperio norteamericano.
					
					Y significa el primer paso de las operaciones militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea en el Oceano Pacifico y el preludio de profunda significacion para mantener a rayas la isla Guam, base avanzada de agresion. 
					
					Esta vez sacamos de nuevo la leccion de que hay que tratar no con palabras discretas, sino con acciones a EE.UU. que actua cinicamente despreciando las medidas iniciativas tomadas por la RPDC para el alivio de la situacion extremadamente tensa. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas libraran mucho mas ejercicios de lanzamiento de cohete balistico tomando por blando el Oceano Pacifico para modernizar y aumentar la capacidad combativa de sus fuerzas estrategicas.

articles.title: Tribunal Central de RPDC sentencia pena capital a escritores conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Tribunal Central de RPDC sentencia pena capital a escritores conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Tribunal Central de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 31 una declaracion que sigue:
					Tan pasmadas ante el impetu independiente y el gran poderio de Corea del Songun que exalta su dignidad como potencia nuclear del Juche y la potencia coheteril de talla mundial, las fuerzas hostiles se obstinan mas en la propaganda demagogica  contra la RPDC.
					
					En la delantera de esta campana estan los compinches conservadores surcoreanos.
					
					Recientemente, "Dong-A Ilbo" y "Chosun Ilbo", periodicos conservadores surcoreanos, cometieron el inaudito crimen de categoria especial de insultar gravemente la dignidad de la RPDC basandose en los contenidos absurdos del libro titulado "Realidad confidencial del Norte de Corea".
					
					El libro fue escrito hace 2 anos por Daniel y James, que fueron corresponsales del semanario Economist y la agencia noticiera Reuters de Gran Bretana en Seul. Como una coleccion de las palabras insultantes pronunciadas por los fugitivos norcoreanos y otras gentuzas, el libro difama y tergiversa la realidad de la RPDC con las sofisterias de que "la vida de los norcoreanos es totalmente capitalista".
					
					A base de ese libro, los escritores venales de "Dong-A Ilbo" y "Chosun Ilbo" pronunciaron unas retoricas absurdas como: "el Norte (de Corea) es el pais donde el dinero tiene la gran influencia mas que en los paises capitalistas", "los jovenes sin celulares se tratan como vencidos", "el ejercito es la unidad de trabajo sin compensacion" y "la persona adinerada puede casarse cuando quiera con otra de buena posicion", etc. Y como si fueran verdaderos sus chismes, lanzaron sin titubeo las palabras malignas y lo calificaron de una "guia con que pueden leer facil e interesantemente los que quieren saber el Norte".
					
					Para colmo, se atrevieron a insertar sin vacilacion alguna la foto falsificada del escudo nacional de la RPDC cambiando por el signo de $ (dolar) la estrella roja en su parte superior, que simboliza la brillante tradicion revolucionaria de la lucha antijaponesa, y el nombre nacional "Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" escrito en su parte inferior por "Republica Capitalista de Corea". Y sustituyeron el titulo del libro "Realidad Confidencial del Norte de Corea" con la "Republica Capitalista de Corea".
					
					Hasta la fecha, Dong-A Ilbo, Chosun Ilbo y otros medios de prensa surcoreanos de caracter conservador vinieron abultando su expediente criminal perpetrando sin cesar la demagogia anti-RPDC. Cada vez que cometian tales crimenes, les hemos advertido seriamente que pagaran el precio carisimo por su imprudencia conflictiva. 
					
					  Sin embargo, ellos se obstinaron en la campana mediatica anti-RPDC desoyendo nuestro consejo y no vacilan en deshonrar ahora hasta el sagrado nombre y el escudo de la RPDC. 
					
					Insatisfechos con denigrar el mas ventajoso regimen socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares inhallable de este orbe, insultaron hasta el escudo y el nombre, simbolo de la dignidad sagrada de la RPDC, lo que deviene el archicrimen antinacional jamas perdonable. 
					
					  No cabe duda de que esta farsa fue orquestada bajo la instigacion y el control de los compinches conservadores malignos en momentos agonicos tras caerse en cadaver vivo por el castigo serio de la historia y las opiniones publicas.
					
					  El articulo 60 del codigo penal de la RPDC estipula que los tipejos que insultaron la dignidad de la RPDC se someten a la pena capital inclusive la muerte segun la severidad de su perpetracion. 
					
					El Tribunal Central de la RPDC dicta, segun el codigo penal de la Republica, la pena capital al periodista Son Hyo Rim y el presidente Kim Jae Ho, de Dong-A Ilbo, y el periodista Yang Ji Ho y el presidente Pang Sang Hun, de Chosun Ilbo, quienes ofendieron la dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Los criminales no pueden apelar tal veredicto y esta pena se ejecutara inmediatamente y sin procesos adicionales en cualquier tiempo y cualquier lugar, de acuerdo con que se confirma el delincuente.
					
					Ademas, perseguiremos hasta el fin a los complices que inventaron y manipularon el acto provocativo inaudito que calumnia e insulta la dignidad de la RPDC y acabaremos con ellos.
					
					Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para advertir a las autoridades surcoreanas que toleran todavia el crimen sin precedentes de los escritores venales de dos diarios surcoreanos.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas no averiguan ni castigan sin demora a los ofensores de la dignidad de la RPDC, reconoceremos a ellas tambien como complices del caso.
					
					Deben saber claramente que no daran benevolencia ni tolerancia a los insultadores de la dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Observaremos atentamente la conducta de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Malasia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Malasia
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion al 15o rey de Malasia, Sultan Muhammad V, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais.
					Tras expresar la conviccion de que se intensificaran y se desarrollaran las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario exitos en sus labores para el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad de Malasia.

articles.title: Dependencia de EE.UU. adelantara la autodestruccion, advierte el CNCDP al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Dependencia de EE.UU. adelantara la autodestruccion, advierte el CNCDP al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- A la madrugada del dia 29, el cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance Hwasong-12 de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acerto el blanco fijado en el Oceano Pacifico Norte atravesando el cielo del archipielago japones. 
					Entonces, los titeres surcoreanos arman alborotos conflictivos como si hubiera estallado una bomba nuclear en medio de Seul. 
					
					Senala el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) en una declaracion fechada 31 y continua:
					
					Tan pronto como se realizara el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohete balistico estrategico de la RPDC, las autoridades surcoreanas consternadas convocaron el comite permanente de la "reunion estatal de seguridad" y publicaron la "declaracion de denuncia". 
					
					Segun el mandato del gobernante de "demostrar la capacidad de fuerte represalia", libraron los ejercicios de lanzamiento de bomba con los cazas F-15K y dieron a la publicidad el entrenamiento de misil balistico Hyonmu.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, insisten en la necesidad de introducir las propiedades estrategicas nucleares de EE.UU. hablando del "fortalecimiento de alianza" y someter a la consideracion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU junto con sus amos norteamericano y japones el problema de lanzamiento de prueba de cohete balistico de la RPDC. 
					
					El presente lanzamiento de prueba de Hwasong-12 que hace imaginar una guerra real significa el primer paso de las operaciones militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea en el Oceano Pacifico, el preludio de profunda significacion para mantener a rayas la isla Guam, base avanzada de agresion, y el principio de las contramedidas intransigentes de la RPDC a los ejercicios belicos de EE.UU. y sus lacayos. 
					
					En el futuro tambien la RPDC desarrollara muchos ejercicios de lanzamiento de cohete balistico tomando por blanco el Oceano Pacifico donde estan estacionadas las bases militares de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y demostrara al soberbio imperio americano la ferrea voluntad de la Corea del Juche no con la palabra sino con la accion.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no deben olvidar ni un momento que su indiscreto alboroto belico en desprecio al poderio del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu dispuesto al combate puede convertir en las cenizas todo el territorio surcoreano. 
					
					Ellos deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que la dependencia de EE.UU. incapaz de salvar su propio destino adelantara la autodestruccion de si mismos.

articles.title: EE.UU. es autor de tension de Peninsula Coreana, apunta representante de RPDC
articles.content:
EE.UU. es autor de tension de Peninsula Coreana, apunta representante de RPDC
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El autor que lleva la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de la guerra es precisamente EE.UU. que se entrega a las extremadas amenazas y chantajes nucleares contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al librar los sucesivos ejercicios de guerra introduciendo en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana la inmensa cantidad de propiedades estrategicas nucleares.
					Asi subrayo el representante permanente coreano ante la Oficina de la ONU y las organizaciones internacionales en Ginebra en su discurso pronunciado el dia 29 en el pleno de la tercera sesion de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme, y continuo:
					
					La larga politica de hostilidad y la cada vez mas creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC obligaron a esta a poseer y fortalecer sin cesar el disuasivo nuclear para hacer frente.
					
					Los ejercicios conjuntos militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, que se desarrollan cada ano en el suelo surcoreano, tienen el caracter agresivo y provocativo, crea la crisis del estallido de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y perturban la paz y la seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					En marzo del ano en curso, la RPDC exigio a convocar la reunion emergente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para tratar los ejercicios conjuntos militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea.
					
					Pero, el CS de la ONU dio espaldas a las reiteradas acusaciones de la RPDC, revelando por si mismo el hecho de que fue convertido en una marioneta y un aparato politico de EE.UU., olvidando la mision principal de preservar la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Ya que pese a las fuertes advertencias de la RPDC, EE.UU. demostro abiertamente la intencion hostil a la RPDC al desarrollar los agresivos ejercicios conjuntos militares, las fuertes contramedidas de la RPDC devienen el justo ejercicio de su derecho a la autodefensa y las responsabilidades de las provenientes consecuencias catastroficas recaeran sobre el pais norteamericano que opto la confrontacion militar con el pais socialista.
					
					Mientras continuen la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, esta no pondra en ningun caso en la mesa de negociaciones el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo ni retrocedera ni un paso en el camino del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
